definitions.definition: To give a formal (usually written) authorization.
definitions.example: It was decided to license Wikipedia under the GFDL.
I am licensed to practice law in this state.

definitions.definition: (of a person or enterprise) having been issued with a licence (by the required authority)
definitions.example: Only licensed exterminators can purchase rat poison in this state.
Even licensed fishing has a major effect on the fish population in the river.
